sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT id, user_id AS RT_id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_type, md_id, ds_id, scheme_id, aeps_balance, aeps_merchant_id, user_tpin
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT benef_name, bank_ac, ifsc, address1, pincode, remarks
FROM aeps_beneficiary_cashfree
WHERE benef_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.BenefIdBank}} */

SELECT SUM(tab.amount::int) as aeps_plaus_amount from tt_aeps_trans tab 
left join m_operator mo on (mo.id=tab.op_id and mo.service_id=tab.service_id)
WHERE tab.user_id=@user_id AND tab.tr_date::date=now()::date AND (tab.status=@status or tab.status=@status1) and (tab.op_id = @op1
or tab.op_id = @op2 or tab.op_id = @op3)

select mo.service_id, mc.operator_id, mc.comm_per, mc.comm_val, mc.service_charge_per, mc.service_charge_val, mo.operator_name 
from m_commission mc
left join m_operator mo on (mo.id=mc.operator_id)
left join m_service ms on (ms.id=mo.service_id)
where mc.scheme_id = @scheme_id and mo.min_amount::int <= @amount and mo.max_amount::int >=@amount and 
(mo.id=270 or mo.id=271 or mo.id=272 or mo.id=465 or mo.id=476)and ms.service_name ='Payout';

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_name, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, aeps_balance AS admin_aeps_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT id AS dt_id, user_fname AS dt_name, user_mobile AS dt_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS dt_aeps_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.ds_id}} */

SELECT m_api.api_code
FROM m_api_forward
LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_forward.api_id)
WHERE m_api.api_type = :P1 /* {{'Payout'}} */

SELECT comm_per AS dt_comm_per, comm_val AS dt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS dt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS dt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */

SELECT id AS mdt_id, user_fname AS mdt_name, user_mobile AS mdt_mobile, scheme_id AS mdt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS mdt_aeps_bal, user_type AS mdt_user_type
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

SELECT comm_per AS mdt_comm_per, comm_val AS mdt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS mdt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS mdt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetDTCreator.mdt_scheme_id}} */

values.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_aeps_trans
(service_id, op_id, api_id, user_id, user_rt_id, merchant_id, amount, op_bal, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, charge_per, charge_val, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_bal, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, api_logs, revert_trans, ip_address, process_mode, live, tr_date, trans_by, dt_comm_per, dt_comm_val, dt_comm_amt, dt_charge_per, dt_charge_val, dt_charge_amount, mdt_comm_per, mdt_comm_val, mdt_comm_amt, mdt_charge_per, mdt_charge_val, mdt_charge_amt, aeps_number) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */, :P3 /* {{0}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P5 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.RT_id}} */, :P6 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_merchant_id}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank}} */, :P8 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P9 /* {{GetOpComm[0].comm_per}} */, :P10 /* {{GetOpComm[0].comm_val}} */, :P11 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_charge_per}} */, :P13 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_charge_val}} */, :P14 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P15 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P16 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P17 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P18 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P19 /* {{'Pending'}} */, :P20 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P21 /* {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}} */, :P22 /* {{GetAPIForward.api_code}} */, '0', :P23 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P24 /* {{'A2C'}} */, :P25 /* {{'Live'}} */, :P26 /* {{NOW}} */, :P27 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P28 /* {{DTCommPer}} */, :P29 /* {{DTCommVal}} */, :P30 /* {{DTCommAmt}} */, :P31 /* {{DTChargePer}} */, :P32 /* {{DTChargeVal}} */, :P33 /* {{DTChargeAmt}} */, :P34 /* {{MDTCommPer}} */, :P35 /* {{MDTCommVal}} */, :P36 /* {{MDTCommAmt}} */, :P37 /* {{MDTChargePer}} */, :P38 /* {{MDTChargeVal}} */, :P39 /* {{MDTChargeAmt}} */, :P40 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_merchant_id}} */)

params.name: :P21
params.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

values.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_aeps_balance
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, status, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */, :P3 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank}} */, :P6 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P8 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, :P9 /* {{'Fund Transfer to Bank'}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */, :P11 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P12 /* {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}} */, :P13 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)

params.name: :P12
params.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from AEPS Wallet to Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

sql.query:
UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{api_log}} */, api_ref = :P3 /* {{api_ref}} */, reason = :P4 /* {{Remarks}} */, api_response_time = :P5 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */, bank_name = :P6 /* {{bank_name}} */, bank_acno = :P7 /* {{ac_no}} */, benef_name = :P8 /* {{benef_name}} */, benef_id = :P9 /* {{$_POST.BenefIdBank}} */, aeps_number = :P10 /* {{ac_no}} */
WHERE id = :P11 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */

values.value: {{'Merchant Id: '+UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_merchant_id+' | Txn. Ref. Id: '+TransactionId+' | Amt. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | Id: '+AEPSRechTrans.identity+' | Net Charge Amt.: '+AdminChargeNetAmt}}

Ref. Id: '+TransactionId+' | Amt. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | Id: '+AEPSRechTrans.identity+' | Net Charge Amt.: '+AdminChargeNetAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */, closing_bal = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */
WHERE id = :P3 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */

INSERT INTO tt_aeps_balance
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, status, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P2 /* {{AEPSRechTrans.identity}} */, :P3 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank}} */, :P6 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_balance}} */, :P8 /* {{'REFUND'}} */, :P9 /* {{'Fund Transfer to bank Refund'}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */, :P11 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P12 /* {{'Refund of Fund Transfer | '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | '+TransactionId+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.aeps_merchant_id+' | '+UserWalletBalCheck.RT_id}} */, :P13 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */)
